channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31480|2024-06-06T17:01:00.228Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- aruba%20instantos%20and%20aruba%20access%20points%20running%20arubaos%2010
item.description: Unauthenticated Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerabilities exist in the CLI service accessed via the PAPI protocol. Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities result in the ability to interrupt the normal operation of the affected service.

item.title: CVE-2024-25615|2024-03-05T20:19:54.342Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- arubaos%20wi-fi%20controllers%20and%20campus%2Fremote%20access%20points
item.description: An unauthenticated Denial-of-Service (DoS) vulnerability exists in the Spectrum service accessed via the PAPI protocol in ArubaOS 8.x. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to interrupt the normal operation of the affected service.

item.title: CVE-2024-31473|2024-06-06T16:53:52.868Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- aruba%20instantos%20and%20aruba%20access%20points%20running%20arubaos%2010
item.description: There is a command injection vulnerability in the underlying deauthentication service that could lead to unauthenticated remote code execution by sending specially crafted packets destined to the PAPI (Aruba's Access Point management protocol) UDP port (8211). Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user on the underlying operating system.
